title: Why do we care about vectors?  From Zero To Geo 1.1

media:group.media:title: Why do we care about vectors?  From Zero To Geo 1.1
media:group.media:description:
Why do we care about vectors?  Vectors are an incredibly important concept both in geometric algebra and in modern mathematics in general.  In this video, I show the motivation for the interpretation of vectors as arrows.  After that, I describe the basics of this conception of vectors.

This video is a part of "From Zero to Geo", a series where we formulate geometric algebra, an incredibly powerful branch of mathematics, from the ground up.  Full playlist here: https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLVuwZXwFua-0Ks3rRS4tIkswgUmDLqqRy
Next video here: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=VwkWmpnJ4RI

Discord: https://discord.gg/3Zj59zA2Rg

Patreon: https://www.patreon.com/sudgylacmoe

Where you should skip depending on your knowledge of vectors (I'm just copying the table of contents, click on the first video that you don't know the topic):

Adding Vectors: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=B9P4d818rlI
Algebra of Vectors: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=dNnUGAwqy14

Linear Combinations/Span: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=uByHD38Xsls
Linear Dependence/Bases: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=rZXen-HX7dA
Components: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=OjbP2Ki-8RY
